comments.comment: Dear Sir, most bravest srilankan Lion in our present history.  We always greatly appreciated, and respect you for your historic action and protecting our motherland, our nation. No other leder could done . They all bend their back before NGO and west. The  30 long years our whole  country suffered, so many times halfway through, after loosing precious numbers of our forces they stopped our battle for peace.  But you are the only  lion strongly without turning, without stopping without bending your back,  continued to the great victory of our country.  You are the sinhale Sinhaya. We all greatly respect you.  Yesterday, today and forevermore.  Generation to generation.
comments.author: HEMAMALI ABEYSINGHE
